price: 32. And surely, all - everyone of them will be brought before Us.
arabic: وَإِن كُلّٞ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wa-in kullun lammā jamīʿun ladaynā muḥ'ḍarūna
